title:
Validate policy match behavior; when P1 dlp profile DOES NOT matches but P2 dlp profile matches
R1: p1 = alert & continue, p2 = Add Headers 
R2: p1 = Add Headers
custom_steps:
1. Create Email Outbound policies as 
R1: p1 = alert & continue, p2 = Add Headers 
R2: p1 = Add Headers 
2. Generate email traffic with dlp profile NOT P1 AND P2 matching content as email subject, body or attachment
3. Verify policy match behavior
4. Verify skopeIT events/alerts generated
custom_expected:
- Verify policy type generated Alert  shows policy match as R1 only - as add header due to p2 dlp profile is terminal policy
- Verify Email sent has header added as per R1 add_header.
- Skopeit should show action in policy and DLP alerts as "ADD HEADERS"
